title: Lotus Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Indian, Organic, Raw, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Open for breakfast and lunch from 8am-3pm every day, and for dinner from 5:30-9pm.  Menu is 100% organic, and all condiments, sauces, and baked goods are vegan.  Many menu items are gluten-free, and raw diets can be accommodated as well. Previously named Planet Palate.
